messages.content: Freedom Planet characters: Me plays Freedom Planet. Lilac: "What are you doing". Me: "hahaha you The Fourth Wall". Lilac: "oh". My Reaction

to Lilac's confusion is a mix of amusement and surprise. I didn't expect her to be aware of the concept of breaking the fourth wall, and her response caught me off guard. It's comical to see her reaction to my playful remark, and I can't help but chuckle at the situation. It adds a fun dynamic to our interaction and makes me appreciate the game even more.
Freedom Planet characters: Me plays Freedom Planet. Lilac: “What are you doing”. Me: “hahaha you The Fourth Wall”. Lilac: “oh”. Lilac Reaction

As an AI language model, I can only speculate on Lilac's reaction based on her character traits and the context of the situation. Lilac, being a strong and determined dragon-like character, might show a mix of confusion and curiosity at my comment about breaking the fourth wall. She might tilt her head slightly, trying to understand what I mean by that. Lilac may then respond with a playful smirk or a witty remark, showcasing her wit and lightheartedness. Ultimately, her reaction would depend on the writer's interpretation of her character and the overall tone of the game.
